p: After 20 min incubation of Fe 2+ with EOLM, ascorbic acid (AA) was added to the reaction medium to confirm whether or not the increase in absorbance in the presence of the oil was attributed to Fe 2+. Absorbance did not change at 5, 10, and 20 min after addition of AA, suggesting that EOLM directly stimulated the oxidation of Fe 2+ to Fe 3+ during the incubation periods (prior to AA addition) ( Figure 4).
